text: Why is spray and pray still the most popular fundraising model?
Most LPs are basing their evaluation of GPs on track record and size. But how effective is it? And could a computer generated algorithm outperform the average analyst?
50 % of GPs have top quartile performance and 90 % are top decile when it comes to pitching skills. All according to GPs themselves.
GP's need to think through how they build LP relationships before they ask for the check
